title: Weather Dashboard
description: This app allows users to see five day weather data based on their current or any location using a weather API. It also includes a UV index and uses local storage to store recent city searches. It uses Jquery and AJAX to generate dynamically updated HTML and CSS.
name: weather

title: Hobby Forum
description: Hobby Spot is a full stack discussion forum application. Users are able to create an account, login, and use those credentials to view and create posts. It uses bcrypt, expressJS, mySQL, handlebars and sequelize
name: hobby

title: FarmBoard
description: FarmBoard is a web app designed to connect local farmers to clients directly by providing them an availabliltiy web link that they can post on their website or facebook. It has dynamically generated HTML and uses MongoDB.
name: farmBoard

title: Inner Light Ministries
description: Inner Light Ministries is an Omnifaith outreach ministry dedicated to spiritual transformation. The web app was built with WordPress.
name: light
